qas.question: What are the technologies used to capture solar energy characterized as?
What are some active solar techniques used to harness solar energy?

answers.text: photovoltaic systems, concentrated solar power and solar water heating

qas.question: What is an example of a passive solar technique?

answers.text: orienting a building to the Sun

context: It is an important source of renewable energy and its technologies are broadly characterized as either <a0_0>passive solar or active solar<a0_0/> depending on the way they capture and distribute solar energy or convert it into solar power. Active solar techniques include the use of <a1_0>photovoltaic systems, concentrated solar power and solar water heating<a1_0/> to harness the energy. Passive solar techniques include <a2_0>orienting a building to the Sun<a2_0/>, selecting materials with favorable thermal mass or light dispersing properties, and designing spaces that naturally circulate air.
